messages.subject: Bakumatsu Seishun Hanafubuki
messages.msgSnippet: Someone beamed me their manga collection which fortunately included the second volume of Hanafubuki... If you d like to download... Please go to
messages.messageBody:
Someone beamed me their manga collection which fortunately included
the second volume of Hanafubuki...

If you'd like to download... Please go to

www.streamload.com/green_2 and go to the shinsengumi folder...
password is still miburo.

^_^ Take care everyone!

~wounds
